footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming ceremonies and find the right experience for you.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred brew that has been used for centuries by indigenous tribes in the Amazon. It is a blend of two plants, the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis), which together create a powerful tool for deep healing and consciousness expansion.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca works on physical, emotional, and spiritual levels. The DMT from Chacruna allows access to higher states of consciousness, while the Ayahuasca vine facilitates the purging and cleansing of the body. The combination guides you through an introspective journey, revealing patterns, healing wounds, and connecting you with your true self.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than just a drink, Ayahuasca is considered a spiritual teacher. It teaches you about yourself, your relationships, and your place in the universe. Each ceremony is a unique conversation with this plant intelligence, offering the lessons you most need at that moment in your life.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Release emotional blockages, reduce anxiety, and find a new perspective on life's challenges.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Confront and heal past traumas in a safe and supportive environment, allowing you to move forward with lightness and peace.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a deep connection with yourself, others, and the universe, rediscovering your life's purpose.
groupCeremonyDescription: Share the experience with others in a circle of trust, where the collective energy amplifies the healing power of the medicine.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized experience, we offer private ceremonies tailored to your specific intentions.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the dedicated team that will accompany you on your healing journey.
guide_desc_wilson: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
contactSubtitle: We are here to answer your questions and help you on your path.
exploreMedicineDescription: Discover the origins, benefits, and transformative power of Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet our experienced guides who will accompany you on your journey.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Preparation is key to a deep and meaningful Ayahuasca ceremony. This guide will help you align your body, mind, and spirit to receive the medicine.
preparationProcessDescription: Ayahuasca is a journey that begins long before the ceremony and continues long after. Understanding the process will help you navigate it with confidence and clarity.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The heart of the journey, where you meet the medicine in a sacred, guided, and protected space.
experienceProcessDescription: An introspective journey of visions, emotions, and revelations. Each experience is unique and personal.
integrationProcessDescription: The process of incorporating the ceremony's teachings into your daily life for lasting transformation.
dietSubtitle: A clean and light diet is essential to prepare your body for the medicine.
allowedFoodsList:
• Fresh fruits and vegetables
• Whole grains (rice, quinoa, oats)
• Legumes (lentils, chickpeas)
• Grilled or steamed fish
• Water and herbal teas
prohibitedFoodsList:
• Red meat and pork
• Fried or processed foods
• Dairy and fermented cheeses
• Refined sugars and spicy foods
• Caffeine and alcohol
mentalPrepSubtitle: Cultivate a state of openness, trust, and respect.
meditationDescription: Practice meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: What do you want to heal or understand? Set clear intentions to guide your journey.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts and feelings to process your experiences.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca often brings suppressed emotions to the surface to be released. Allow yourself to feel without judgment. The journey can be intense, but the reward is a deep sense of peace and liberation.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare for a night of introspection and comfort.
comfortItemsList:
• Comfortable and warm clothing (in layers)
• Blanket and pillow
• Water bottle
• Journal and pen
essentialsList:
• Open mind and heart
• Clear intentions
• Respect for the medicine and the process
preparationCtaDescription: Prepare for a transformative journey. Follow our guide to align body, mind, and spirit.

registerSubtext: Join our community to access exclusive content.

chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any pre-existing medical conditions?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDesc: Include any heart problems, high blood pressure, diabetes, etc.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication?
questionnaireMedicationDesc: Include antidepressants, anxiolytics, or other prescribed drugs.
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list the medications you are taking:
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions?
questionnaireMentalHealthDesc: Such as schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, or psychosis.
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please detail your mental health history:

questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experience:

questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: E.g., I want to heal emotional wounds from my childhood and find my life's purpose...

newTemplateMessageES: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at El Arte de Sanar. You can do it here: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/questionnaire
newTemplateMessageEN: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at The Art of Healing. You can do it here: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/questionnaire
exportDataDescription: Create a full backup of all data (users, ceremonies, etc.) to a JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore the application from a JSON file. This action will overwrite all current data.
importWarningDescription: You are about to overwrite ALL current data with the file's content. This action is irreversible. An automatic backup will be created before importing.
importSuccessDescription: Data has been restored from the file.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup of the data was created before the last import. You can roll back to that state if needed.
rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to revert the data to the state before the last import? This action is irreversible.
rollbackSuccessDescription: Data has been reverted to the previous state.

contactCommunityText: Join our WhatsApp community to receive updates, share experiences, and connect with other spiritual seekers.
aiGuideDescription: Your preparation continues! You now have access to two key tools:
aiGuideContent: Our **AI Guide** is available 24/7 to answer your questions about the ceremony, preparation, and healing process. Additionally, we have prepared a series of **video courses** to deepen your preparation.
themeCustomizationDescription: Customize the colors and appearance of the application for light and dark modes.
